remarks: Disjointness from a subgroup sum.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 21-Apr-2016.)
statement:
lsmcntz.p $e |- .(+) = ( LSSum ` G ) $.
lsmcntz.s $e |- ( ph -> S e. ( SubGrp ` G ) ) $.
lsmcntz.t $e |- ( ph -> T e. ( SubGrp ` G ) ) $.
lsmcntz.u $e |- ( ph -> U e. ( SubGrp ` G ) ) $.
lsmdisj.o $e |- .0. = ( 0g ` G ) $.
lsmdisj.i $e |- ( ph -> ( ( S .(+) T ) i^i U ) = { .0. } ) $.
lsmdisj $p |- ( ph -> ( ( S i^i U ) = { .0. } /\ ( T i^i U ) = { .0. } ) ) $.
